scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.copy: npm run copy-assets && npm run copy-styles && npm run copy-app-assets
scripts.copy-assets: if [ -d src/assets ]; then shx --verbose cp -R src/assets/. dist/assets/; fi
scripts.copy-styles: if [ -d src/scss ]; then shx --verbose cp -R src/scss/. dist/scss/; fi
scripts.copy-app-assets: shx --verbose cp src/*.txt dist/ | true && shx --verbose cp src/*.html dist/ | true && shx --verbose cp src/*.ejs dist/ | true && shx --verbose cp src/*.json dist/ | true
scripts.dist: mkdir lib && cd dist && tar cvzf ../lib/<%-name.toLowerCase()%>.tar.gz *
